attributes.action: A Government funded app to show available land for the planting of trees.
attributes.additional_details: The reason tree planting is important is to tackle climate change and aid in the UK’s target to carbon neutrality by 2050
attributes.background: A STEP TOWARDS CARBON NEUTRALITY! To show available areas all around the country for Tree Planting. To show simple steps of how to grow a tree from the seed to encourage people to grow their own and plant it! This scheme could also be implemented in schools as part of a Life’s Skills Curriculum.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you want to support the planting of trees, but whether or not land is available for the planting of trees would be a matter for the landowner, and this may be a private individual or business, rather than a local authority.

We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign: 

Enshrine tree planting target in law: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/552296

Establish a national tree-planting scheme for graduating students: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/554235

Create a programme to plant a tree for every baby born in England: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/560715

If you want the Government to take an action not covered by the above you could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
